title: A1 Final Exam: Fintech & Digital Economy

items.prompt: Please ________ the QR code on the ATM screen.
How ________ is the APY for this savings vault?
items.explanation: Use 'How much' for rates and quantities.

items.prompt: The subscription payment is due ________ Friday.
items.explanation: Use 'on' for specific days of the week.

items.prompt: Look at ________ virtual pockets in my app.
items.explanation: Use 'these' for plural things close to the speaker.

items.prompt: You ________ use Face ID to protect your account.
